 10: /*
 11:    User interface for various matrix operations added in SLEPc
 12: */

 14: #if !defined(SLEPCMAT_H)
 15: #define SLEPCMAT_H
 16: #include <petscmat.h>

 18: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode MatCreateTile(PetscScalar,Mat,PetscScalar,Mat,PetscScalar,Mat,PetscScalar,Mat,Mat*);
 19: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode MatCreateVecsEmpty(Mat,Vec*,Vec*);
 20: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode MatNormEstimate(Mat,Vec,Vec,PetscReal*);

 22: /* Deprecated functions */
 23: PETSC_DEPRECATED_FUNCTION("Use MatCreateRedundantMatrix() followed by MatConvert()") static inline PetscErrorCode SlepcMatConvertSeqDense(Mat mat,Mat *newmat)
 24: {
 25:   Mat Ar;
 26:   MatCreateRedundantMatrix(mat,0,PETSC_COMM_SELF,MAT_INITIAL_MATRIX,&Ar);
 27:   MatConvert(Ar,MATSEQDENSE,MAT_INITIAL_MATRIX,newmat);
 28:   MatDestroy(&Ar);
 29:   PetscFunctionReturn(0);
 30: }
 31: PETSC_DEPRECATED_FUNCTION("Use MatCreateTile()") static inline PetscErrorCode SlepcMatTile(PetscScalar a,Mat A,PetscScalar b,Mat B,PetscScalar c,Mat C,PetscScalar d,Mat D,Mat *G) {return MatCreateTile(a,A,b,B,c,C,d,D,G);}

 33: #endif
